info.title: DataLakeAnalyticsAccountManagementClient
info.description: Creates an Azure Data Lake Analytics account management client.

get.description: Gets the first page of Data Lake Analytics accounts, if any, within a specific resource group. This includes a link to the next page, if any.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of accounts in the specified resource group.

get.description: Gets the first page of Data Lake Analytics accounts, if any, within the current subscription. This includes a link to the next page, if any.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of Azure Data Lake Analytics accounts.

get.description: Gets details of the specified Data Lake Analytics account.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the details of the specified account.

delete.description: Begins the delete delete process for the Data Lake Analytics account object specified by the account name.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to delete

202.description: Successfully initiated the deletion of the specified account.

204.description: The specified account was not found.

put.description: Creates the specified Data Lake Analytics account. This supplies the user with computation services for Data Lake Analytics workloads

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.the account will be associated with.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to create.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create Data Lake Analytics account operation.

201.description: Successfully initiated creation of the specified account.

patch.description: Updates the Data Lake Analytics account object specified by the accountName with the contents of the account object.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group that contains the Data Lake Analytics account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account to update.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the update Data Lake Analytics account operation.

201.description: Successfully initiated an update of the specified account.

accessKey.description: the access key associated with this Azure Storage account that will be used to connect to it.

suffix.description: the optional suffix for the storage account.

accessKey.description: the updated access key associated with this Azure Storage account that will be used to connect to it.

suffix.description: the optional suffix for the storage account.

UpdateStorageAccountProperties.description: Azure Storage account properties information to update.

properties.description: the properties associated with this storage account.

lastModifiedTime.description: the last modified time of the blob container.

StorageContainerProperties.description: Azure Storage blob container properties information.

name.description: the name of the blob container.

id.description: the unique identifier of the blob container.

type.description: the type of the blob container.

properties.description: the properties of the blob container.

value.description: the results of the list operation

nextLink.description: the link (url) to the next page of results.

ListStorageContainersResult.description: The list of blob containers associated with the storage account attached to the Data Lake Analytics account.

accessToken.description: the access token for the associated Azure Storage Container.

nextLink.description: the link (url) to the next page of results.

ListSasTokensResult.description: The SAS response that contains the storage account, container and associated SAS token for connection use.

suffix.description: the optional suffix for the Data Lake Store account.

DataLakeStoreAccountInfoProperties.description: Data Lake Store account properties information.

properties.description: the properties associated with this Data Lake Store account.

value.description: the results of the list operation

nextLink.description: the link (url) to the next page of results.

value.description: the results of the list operation

nextLink.description: the link (url) to the next page of results.

provisioningState.description: the provisioning status of the Data Lake Analytics account.

state.description: the state of the Data Lake Analytics account.

defaultDataLakeStoreAccount.description: the default data lake storage account associated with this Data Lake Analytics account.

maxDegreeOfParallelism.description: the maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account.

queryStoreRetention.description: the number of days that job metadata is retained.

maxJobCount.description: the maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time.

systemMaxDegreeOfParallelism.description: the system defined maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account, which restricts the maximum value of parallelism the user can set for the account..

systemMaxJobCount.description: the system defined maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time, which restricts the maximum number of running jobs the user can set for the account.

dataLakeStoreAccounts.description: the list of Data Lake storage accounts associated with this account.

storageAccounts.description: the list of Azure Blob storage accounts associated with this account.

endpoint.description: the full CName endpoint for this account.

newTier.description: the billing tier to use for next month.

currentTier.description: the billing tier in use for the current month.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountProperties.description: The account specific properties that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Analytics account.

maxDegreeOfParallelism.description: the maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account.

queryStoreRetention.description: the number of days that job metadata is retained.

maxJobCount.description: the maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time.

newTier.description: the billing tier to use for next month.

UpdateDataLakeAnalyticsAccountProperties.description: The properties to update that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Analytics account to.

properties.description: the properties for the Data Lake Store account being added.
the properties for the Azure Storage account being added.

AddStorageAccountParameters.description: Storage account parameters for a storage account being added to a Data Lake Analytics account.

properties.description: the properties for the Azure Storage account being updated.

UpdateStorageAccountParameters.description: Storage account parameters for a storage account being updated in a Data Lake Analytics account.

properties.description: The properties that can be updated in an existing Data Lake Analytics account.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccountUpdateParameters.description: The parameters that can be used to update an existing Data Lake Analytics account.

properties.description: The properties defined by Data Lake Analytics all properties are specific to each resource provider.

DataLakeAnalyticsAccount.description: A Data Lake Analytics account object, containing all information associated with the named Data Lake Analytics account.

value.description: the results of the list operation

nextLink.description: the link (url) to the next page of results.

code.description: the HTTP status code or error code associated with this error

message.description: the error message localized based on Accept-Language

target.description: the target of the particular error (for example, the name of the property in error).

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
